column6: Police from the Office of Investigation and Immigration raided properties in Khan Chbar Ampov.------As a result
column7: a total of 10 Chinese nationals were arrested for having sexually exploited young women and minors in China.------Whether this is related to ------child pornography------ or VoIP scamming is not clear at this time.------The 10 were detained and sent to the General Department to carry out the proceedings of the law.------As the victims appear to be in China
column8: it is likely they will be deported to answer charges there.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/398679
